Draft Rating:

D+

Danny Ferry ranks in the 38th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Ferry's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 4 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Daniel Gibson with 42th pick but was worth 38th pick.
  • Drafted Christian Eyenga with 30th pick but was worth 27th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Dennis Schröder with 17th pick but was worth 49th pick.
  • Drafted J.J. Hickson with 19th pick but was worth 46th pick.
  • Drafted Shannon Brown with 25th pick but was worth 42th pick.

Trade Rating:

C

Danny Ferry ranks in the 50th percentile for trading among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Kyle Korver to ATL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added John Salmons to ATL.
  • Lost Lucas Nogueira, Lou Williams to TOR.

Signing Rating:

D-

Danny Ferry ranks in the 22th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.

Their worst signings:
